form.IN:
Oblike
lie, lies, lying, lay
/l*e*I/
,
lain
/l*e*In/
uporabljamo kot glagol pri pomenih od 1 do 6 in pri fraznih glagolih. Oblike
lie, lies, lying, lied
uporabljamo kot glagol pri 8. pomenu.
Lies
je tudi množinska oblika samostalnika pri 7. pomenu.

sense.def:
To be lying somewhere
pomeni biti v vodoravnem položaju, tako da ne stojimo in ne sedimo.

seg.quote: I lay there trying to remember what he looked like.
Judy was lying flat on the bed.

sense.def:
Kadar neki predmet
lies in a particular place
, je v vodoravnem položaju na nekem kraju.

seg.quote: The coffin lay undisturbed for centuries.

sense.def:
Kadar neki kraj
lies in a particular position
, je v nekem položaju.

seg.quote: The bridge lies beyond the docks.
The causes of this lie deep in the history of society.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lies ahead
, se bo zgodilo v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: Endless hours of pleasure lie before you.
...an unwelcome foretaste of what lay in store.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
lie
povemo, v kakšnem položaju je nekdo med tekmovanjem. Na primer:
to be lying third
pomeni biti tretji po vrsti.

A lie
je tisto, kar nekdo reče, čeprav ve, da ni res.

To be lying
pomeni govoriti nekaj, kar vemo, da ni res.

To lie down
pomeni namestiti se v vodoravno lego, navadno zato, da bi počivali.

seg.quote: He lay down on the couch.

sense.def:
To take unfair treatment lying down
pomeni sprejeti krivično ravnanje brez pritoževanja ali odpora;

seg.quote: She was never one to take bullying lying down.
Are you saying that the fault generally lies with the management?
